stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, instead of breaching R&D, you may install this resource from your grip, ignoring all costs. trash: The Corp draws 2 cards. Limit 1 per deck.
text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, instead of breaching R&D, you may install this resource from your grip, ignoring all costs. [trash]: The Corp draws 2 cards. Limit 1 per deck.
title: Eden Shard
